result.execSummary:
The defendant Duane L True was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Duane L True is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Duane L True was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).
  • Duane L True was found guilty of Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $268.00 court costs to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office within 60 days or set up a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in a warrant.

Not to possess or consume alcohol.  Not to be in/on any premises that sell alcohol as their primary business, includes bars, taverns and liquor stores.  Subject to random testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.
Not to possess or use illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.  Subject to random testing to determine compliance upon reasonable suspicion.  
Continued no contact with Mary Ann Scoglio.

Must undergo a Domestic Abuse/Anger Management assessment within 45 days and comply with recommendations for treatment.
Must cooperate with any evaluation, assessment and/or correctional program as directed by the Department of Corrections or supervising agent and comply with recommendations.
Must provide a DNA sample.
Must only use prescription medications as prescribed by a physician and only in the amounts prescribed.
Alcohol monitor removed if agent approves.  May be subject to continue the alcohol monitor if agent requires it.
Must complete an AODA assessment and comply with recommendations.

records.addlTxt: from DOC to Judge Vlack requesting clarification of probationary terms

ADDRESS INFO for Duane L True
Current: 2363  240th Avenue, Cushing, WI 54006 United States  (Effective: 09-29-2017)
Prior: 2377 240th Ave, Cushing, WI 54006 United States

Cases: 12CF367 14CF07 14CF215 15CF175 16CF13 16CF43. Defendant Duane L True in court with attorney Mark Drew Biller.  Jeffrey Lawrence Kemp appeared for the State of Wisconsin. RL-clerk 9:22 am. Atty Biller addresses ct re agreement. DA addresses ct. DA addresses CT re potential conflict re 12CF367, these files are all ADA Ken Sortedahl's cases, and appearing today only for State. Atty Biller waives disq regarding this. CT questions def re conflict. CT approves waiver for today. CT questions def re plea questionnaire.  
 
12CF367: G plea to count 1 possession. CT questions def re pleas. CT accepts pleas. 
14CF215: G plea to count 1 and count 3. CT accepts pleas. 
16CF13: G plea to bail jump count 1 and count 5 battery. CT accepts pleas.
16CF43: G plea to obstruction count 2 and count 4 bail jump. 
CT accepts pleas to 7 counts. CT finds def G of these 7 counts. CT: 14CF07 is dismissed, 15CF175 is read in and dism.  DA addresses ct re joint resolution. Atty Biller addresses ct. 

Sentence: 16CF43: Count 2: 9 months jail time imposed/stayed. Count 4: 2 years prison, 3 years ES: imposed/stayed, Counts 2 and 4 are consecutive. All other counts, 5 years probation, concurrent.  CT- def must sign up at probation today by 11:00 am. CT- 10 months credit for time served, attys must determine which case def is eligible for credit. 16CF13: 5 years probation, concurrent. 14CF12CF367: 5 years probation, concurrent. 14CF215: 5 years probation, concurrent. 

CT- court costs on each of the 7 counts,  plus DNA surcharge $200 assessed once per file only- total of $800 for DNA surcharges. Fines payable to COCC, def to set up PP. Fail to pay- warrant. Any bond money paid to be applied to fines/costs. 

CT orders conditional time: 12CF367 meth possession count 1:  365 days conditional PCJ, stayed. 
16CF13: battery count 5: 6 months conditional time PCJ, stayed. 
14CF215: count 1 bail jump- 9 months condtional JT stayed, consecutive.   

Def must continue to follow AODA plan/treatment program that def is currently in. Def must complete a domestic abuse/anger managment assessment within 45 days, and comply with plan. Any other evaulation by DOC as required.  CT- no alcohol, no drugs, no para, no illegal substances. Def may only take prescribed medications. Continues no contact with Mary Ann Scoglio. Subject to random UA's/PBT tests at probation agent's discretion.  Atty Biller- requests the def's alcohol moniter which was a requirement of bond be discontinued. DA does not object to this request.  CT- approves request to remove def's alcohol moniter if the probation agent approves.  May be subject to continue the alcohol monitor only if probation agent requires it. PCR. 10:10 am adj.

FPT in 12CF367, others set for status.  ADA-- resolution in all cases. Atty Biller agrees re resolution. CT- JT can be removed from calendar for 9/15/17. 11:40 am adj.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 15, 2017 at 09:00 am.
